name: Botany (liver man)
description:
Grow and sustain various available plants! Nourish your plants to prevent them from going bad to maximize profits!

[Controls]
WASD - Movement
Left click - Pickup/interact with current tool
Right click - Drop current item

IF POSSIBLE, USE THE WINDOWS BUILD. IT SEEMS LESS ERROR PRONE THAN WEBGL

[Credits]

Ordinary Bag Studios:

TheLiverMan - Programmer
Yeebus - Artist, SFX and Musician
Acer  - Artist (Assets and Cover Arts)
Alv Cyktor - Artist and Concept Artist

Produced in 3 days; a submission for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6.
